content: make the purr-fect cozy accessory with this beginner-friendly crochet cat ear hat pattern worked flat as a simple rectangle and seamed to create adorable pointy ears this easy crochet beanie pattern is fun quick and suitable for all skill levels the pattern includes 5 sizes baby to adult large so you can make matching hats for the whole family the chunky ribbing adds warmth and stretch while the straightforward design makes it a relaxing project for evenings or weekends whether you re creating a great gift for a cat lover a whimsical winter hat or a last-minute market stall item this cat ear beanie is sure to be a hit use super chunky yarn for a squishy comfy feel or worsted weight for a lighter version pattern details skill level beginner stitches used chain chain single_crochet single_crochet back loop only blo slip_stitch slip_stitch sizes included baby toddler child teen - adult small adult large materials super chunky yarn 10mm crochet hook yarn needle scissors measuring tape make yours in classic black for a black cat slouch hat vibe or go bold with bright colors for a playful twist yarn 1 ball of lion brand wool-ease thick and quick in the color black canyon 153 or graphite 151 super bulky/super chunky/14-ply yarn- 125yd/142g/114m any super bulky weight yarn 06 can be used for this pattern alternative yarn - 1 x smaller sizes/2 x teen and adult sizes king cole big value super chunky approx 180 yards try black yarn for a black cat slouch hat look hook size 10 mm us n/p sizing newborn - 3 months baby - head circumference = 13-16 / finished length = 12 1-3 years - head circumference = 18-21 / finished length = 16 5 to 12 years - head circumference = 19-22 /finished length = 18 teens to medium adults - head circumference = 22-23 / finished length = 20 large adult - co 32 / head circumference = 24-25 / finished length = 22 you may want to adjust the head circumference/finished length depending on the recipient of the hat
